raw: China to offer trade war tariff exemptions on 700 US farm, medical, energy products amid coronavirus .
replaced: China to offer trade war tariff exemptions on 700 US farm, medical, energy products amid coronavirus .

raw: China announced on Tuesday that it will allow importers to apply for exemptions to additional trade war tariffs on nearly 700 types of goods from the United States , including farm and energy products , as the country battles the coronavirus outbreak that has infected over 70,000 people .
replaced: China announced on Tuesday that China will allow importers to apply for exemptions to additional trade war tariffs on nearly 700 types of goods from Washington , including farm and energy products , as China battles the coronavirus outbreak .

raw: Importers can apply for tariff exemptions starting from March 2 , according to a statement released by the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council .
replaced: Importers can apply for The exemptions starting from March 2 , according to a statement released by the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council  the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council .

raw: The exemptions would only be effective for one year , subject to approval , with the commission adding that each application would need to undergo an approval process .
replaced: The exemptions would only be effective for one year , subject to approval , with the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council adding that each application would need to undergo an approval process .

raw: “ [ The exemptions are ] to support enterprises to import goods from the US based upon their business considerations , ” the commission said in their statement .
replaced: “ [ The exemptions are ] to support enterprises to import goods from Washington based upon enterprises business considerations , ” the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council said in the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council  a statement released by the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council .

raw: The list contains 697 products lines , from soybeans , pork , and beef , to liquefied natural gas and crude oil , which have all been drawn into the tariff battle between the world ’s two largest economies .
replaced: The list contains 697 products lines , from soybeans , pork , and beef , to liquefied natural gas and crude oil , which have all been drawn into the tariff battle between the world ’s two largest economies .

raw: It also includes dozens of types of medical equipment such as thermometers , which are vital to help contain the coronavirus , which causes the disease known as Covid-19 and has killed over 1,800 people .
replaced: The list also includes dozens of types of medical equipment such as thermometers , which are vital to help contain the coronavirus , which causes the disease known as Covid-19 and has killed over 1,800 people .

raw: China is trying to source supplies of meat and medical products from across the globe as the country ’s own output is unable to meet demand .
replaced: China is trying to source supplies of meat and medical products from across the globe as China ’s own output is unable to meet demand .

raw: The Ministry of Commerce said earlier this month that the country would vigorously purchase meat products from other countries and regions to ensure adequate supply in China , while it would also import more medical supplies as well as daily necessities .
replaced: The Ministry of Commerce said earlier this month that China would vigorously purchase meat products from other countries and regions to ensure adequate supply in China , while China would also import more medical supplies as well as daily necessities .

raw: Before the new tariff exemptions , both Beijing and Washington had halved additional duties on certain respective imports from February 14 , when the phase one trade deal signed in December officially took effect .
replaced: Before The exemptions , both Beijing and Washington had halved additional duties on certain respective imports from February 14 , when the phase one trade deal signed in December officially took effect .

raw: China announced at the start of February that it would halve additional tariffs on US$ 75 billion of American products imposed late last year , one of the first signs that Beijing was implementing the phase one deal with the US despite the coronavirus outbreak .
replaced: China announced at the start of February that China would halve additional tariffs on US$ 75 billion of American products imposed late last year , one of the first signs that Beijing was implementing the phase one deal with Washington despite the coronavirus outbreak .

raw: Beijing cut a 10 per cent punitive tariff to 5 per cent , and a 5 per cent tariff to 2.5 per cent on February 14 , according to China ’s Ministry of Finance .
replaced: Beijing cut a 10 per cent punitive tariff to 5 per cent , and a 5 per cent tariff to 2.5 per cent on February 14 , according to China ’s Ministry of Finance .

raw: In response , the US halved a 15 per cent additional tariff on US$ 120 billion of Chinese goods to 7.5 per cent .
replaced: In response , Washington halved a 15 per cent additional tariff on US$ 120 billion of Chinese goods to 7.5 per cent .

raw: On Sunday , China also announced that it would remove the import ban on all US poultry products with its own farms under threat from the deadly H5N1 bird flu .
replaced: On Sunday , China also announced that China would remove the import ban on all US poultry products with China own farms under threat from the deadly H5N1 bird flu .
